exercises.name: Rear delt stretchy band
exercises.notes: Directly in line the rear delt in a lunged position, have strong mind muscle connection

exercises.name: Negative Situps
exercises.notes: Lower core focus; emphasis on slow negative portion.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.notes: Posterior core + scapula stabilisation. Allow no pelvic tilt; keep pelvis locked. Knees raised variation is excellent.

exercises.name: Dead Bugs
exercises.notes: Preferred over bird dogs by trainer note.

exercises.name: I-T-Y-W Raises (Sagittal/Transverse plane)
exercises.notes: Short demo of sagittal plane variation.

exercises.name: Prone External Rotation (Elbows Supported)
exercises.notes: Harder without a bench; elbows supported on a block.

exercises.name: Side-Lying Shoulder External Rotation
exercises.notes: Likely biases teres minor more; better with externally rotated wrist.

exercises.name: Rear Delt Row (Wide-Grip)
exercises.notes: Use lat pulldown attachment; wide grip; elbows ~45Â°.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.notes: Lead with posterior pelvic tilt and drive up from there; keep core braced. Maintain neutral/posterior tilt while breathing. Progress to single leg.

exercises.name: Hip Thrust
exercises.notes: Move feet farther out to bias glutes over quads. Progress to single leg.

exercises.name: Lateral Bunkies (Isometric)
exercises.notes: Hold body completely in line; hits many stabilisers.

exercises.name: Banded step outs
exercises.notes: Tap for out to side with band around ankles, just like in the pilates class

exercises.name: Lateral Bunkies (Bent-Leg on Small Stand)
exercises.notes: Great for targeting glute medius; test knee valgus control.
